content: literary knit square people we meet on vacation novel by emily henry materials & tools key 10 yarn colors dk weight recommended a color a blue - pool knitting needles size 9 or appropriate b color b white pool edge window size for yarn roof c color c pink patio tile gauge d color d light pink patio tile 36 stitches and 36 row e color e green grass f color f orange building measurements g color g mossy green hills 6 x 6 square h color h burnt yellow hills i color i burnt red hills j color j blue sky k knit stitch p purl stitch note this pattern is non-reversible outside of 1 -4 and 33-36 even numbered row are the right side and odd number row are the wrong side pattern cast on 36 stiches row 1-4 k36 a row 5 k36 a row 6 k4 a p28 a k4 a you ll use color a again but i recommend cutting it at this point and rejoining later row 7 k36 b row 8 k4 b p28 b k4 b you ll use color b again but i recommend cutting it at this point please note that the knitted square in and rejoining later this photo has not been blocked yet row 9 k5 c k2 d k4 c k2 d k4 c k2 d k4 c k2 d k4 c k2 d k5 c row 10 k4 c p1 c p2 d p4 c p2 d p4 c p2 d p4 c p2 d p4 c p2 d p1 c k4 c row 11 k13 d k23 e row 12 k4 e p18 e p10 d k4 d row 13 k5 c k2 d k4 c k2 d k2 c k21 f row 14 k4 f p2 f p13 b p2 f p2 c p2 d p4 c p2 d p1 c k4 c finished with colors c and d row 15 k15 e k2 f k1 b k5 a k1 b k5 a k1 b k6 f row 16 k4 f p2 f p1 b p5 a p1 b p5 a p1 b p2 f p11 e k4 e row 17 k11 g k4 e k2 f k1 b k2 a k1 e k2 a k1 b k5 a k1 b k6 f row 18 k4 f p2 f p1 b p3 a p2 e p1 b p1 a p3 e p1 a p1 b p2 f p3 e p8 g k4 g row 19 k5 h k2 i k6 g k2 e k2 f k1 b k1 a k4 e k1 b k2 e k3 a k1 b k6 f row 20 k4 f p2 f p1 b p2 a p3 e p1 b p5 e p1 b p2 f p7 g p2 i p2 h k4 h row 21 k7 h k3 i k5 g k2 f k1 b k5 e k1 b k3 e k2 a k1 b k6 f finished
